notes
property.value:
v3 Navalland

Victory Condition

-Controlling 5 capitals


Changelog

-Enhanced graphics and sounds

-Combat first

-Kwangtung is now a Chinese territory and its value is relocated to Australia

-Iceland is now an American territory

-A British sub is added to SZ 35

-A Russian infantry is added to Eastern Ukraine

-No technology, bid or optional rule

-No losing remaining income after losing capitals

-Factories cannot be damaged more than its territory values

-Cruiser cost decreased by 1


China Rules
+1 infantry for every two territories controlled by China at the beginning of her turn. These infantry must be place in a territory with less than three China pieces.
No China Units, including the China Fighter may leave China territory (except for Kwangtung) (this means no entering sea zones).
